devdoc.author: kvadlamani92
devdoc.details: Functional calls are implemented without side effects. This contract inherits Open Zeppelin's Ownable, Upgradable and Burnable.

params.itemId: item id of the token created. Increments when a new item is added to the marketplace.
params.nftContract: contract address of the token listed in the marketplace
params.owner: address of the actual owner who minted the token
params.price: price in wei listed in the marketplace
params.sold: boolean describing if the token is sold
params.tokenId: id of the token listed in the marketplace

createMarketItem(address,uint256,uint256.details: safeguards re-entrancy using openzeppelin's nonReentrant modifier

params._nftContract: contract address of the item listed in the marketplace
params._price: price set by the seller for the item listed in the marketplace

createMarketSale(address,uint256).details: safeguards re-entrancy using openzeppelin's nonReentrant modifier

params._nftContract: contract address of the item bought by the buyer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_itemIds.details: Counts the number of items in the marketplace

_itemsSold.details: Counts the number of sold items in the marketplace

devdoc.title: NFT Marketplace

MarketItemCreated(uint256,address,uint25.notice: Event emitted when a new market item is created

MarketItemSold(uint256,address).notice: Event emitted when a token is bought by a buyer

createMarketItem(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Creates a new item in the marketplace

createMarketSale(address,uint256).notice: Makes the sale between buyer and seller and transfers the amount to the seller

fetchMarketItems().notice: Fetches all the items listed on the marketplace

userdoc.notice: Allows a user to create, buy and sell NFTs
